</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	responsible, at Seller&#8217;s sole cost and expense, for causing the full reconveyance/termination of the Encumbrances on or before the Closing and for devoting commercially reasonable efforts to satisfying all reasonable requirements for the Seller set forth in the Title Report. For all other objectionable items, Seller shall have the right to cure or attempt to cure Buyer&#8217;s objections to such exceptions or other matters within two (2) business Days after receiving the Objection Notice. Seller shall notify Buyer in writing within said two (2) business Day period as to whether it has successfully cured Buyer&#8217;s objections described in the Objection Notice (as evidenced by a supplement issued by Title Insurer to the Title Report) and(or) Seller is unable or elects not to cure any one or more of Buyer&#8217;s objections, and request that Buyer waive Buyer&#8217;s right to terminate this Agreement due to such objections (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Title Response
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;). Except with respect to any Encumbrances, Seller shall have the right to cure any such disapproved title items by causing the Title Insurer to endorse or &#8220;write around&#8221; the same. If Buyer so receives a Title Response indicating that Seller is unable or elects not to cure any one or more of Buyer&#8217;s objections, then Buyer shall have the right and option to either terminate this Agreement pursuant to Section 7.6 hereof by providing the Disapproval Notice or to waive its right to terminate this Agreement in writing due to such objections by the delivery of an Approval Notice. Upon any such termination, Buyer shall promptly be refunded the Deposit. If Seller fails to respond to Buyer&#8217;s objections within two (2) business Days after receiving the Objection Notice, Seller shall be deemed to have elected not to cure such objections and Buyer shall have the right and option to either terminate this Agreement pursuant to Section 7.6 hereof by providing the Disapproval Notice or to waive its right to terminate this Agreement due to such objections by providing the Approval Notice. Buyer may rely upon a preliminary title opinion prepared by an Iowa attorney based on certified abstracts of title to the Real Property in accordance with Iowa Land Title Association and American Title Association. The obligation to furnish the title coverage as set forth herein shall remain in effect and shall survive Closing. Any exceptions as a condition to a policy shall be dealt with at the time of a commitment or issuance of a title policy.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	5.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Supplement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Title Insurer may issue a supplement or supplements to the Title Report that indicate additional exception(s) to title (other than the Permitted Property Exceptions) not set forth in the Title Report and(or) the Survey (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Supplement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;). Buyer&#8217;s review and acceptance of or objection to any additional exception(s) to title
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	in a Supplement (other than the Permitted Property Exceptions) shall be in Buyer&#8217;s reasonable discretion. If Buyer objects to any additional exception(s) in a Supplement (other than the Permitted Property Exceptions), it shall do so by written notice to Seller (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Supplemental Objection Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), which Supplemental Objection Notice shall be given no later than three (3) Days after Buyer&#8217;s receipt of the applicable Supplement and all title documents with respect to any additional exceptions to title set forth in such Supplement. Except as herein provided, if Buyer fails to object to any such exceptions or other matters set forth in Supplement pursuant to the Supplement Objection Notice, as so provided, then Buyer shall be deemed to have approved such exceptions and other matters set forth in the Supplement. Regardless of whether Buyer objects to the same or not, as so provided, Seller shall be responsible, at Seller&#8217;s sole cost and expense, for causing the full reconveyance/termination of the Encumbrances on or before the Closing and for satisfying all reasonable requirements for the Seller in the Title Report and the Supplement. Seller shall have the right to cure or attempt to cure Buyer&#8217;s objections to such exceptions or other matters within two (2) Days after receiving the Supplemental Objection Notice or Buyer&#8217;s deemed disapproval of the matters set forth in a Supplemental. Seller shall notify Buyer in writing within said two (2) Day period as to whether it has successfully cured Buyer&#8217;s objections set forth in the Supplement Objection Notice (as evidenced by a supplement issued by Title Insurer to the Title Report) and(or) Seller is unable or elects not to cure any one or more of Buyer&#8217;s objections, and request that Buyer waive Buyer&#8217;s right to terminate this Agreement due to such objections (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Supplemental Title Response
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;). Except with respect to any Encumbrances, Seller shall have the right to cure any such disapproved title items by causing the Title Insurer to endorse or &#8220;write around&#8221; the same. If Buyer so receives a Supplemental Title Response indicating that Seller is unable or elects not
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage142"></A>
<A NAME="BPI201510-KXEXX1058_HTM_S03189AB92710D514120057E060C1A344">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	to cure any one or more of Buyer&#8217;s objections, then Buyer shall have the right and option, but not the obligation, to terminate this Agreement; provided such notice of termination is provided to Seller within two (2) Days of receipt of the Supplemental Title Response indicating that Seller is unable or elects not to cure any one or more of Buyer&#8217;s objections. If Buyer fails to provide notice of termination within two (2) Days of receipt of such Supplemental Title Response from Seller indicating that Seller is unable or elects not to cure any one or more of Buyer&#8217;s objections, then Buyer shall be deemed to have waived the right to terminate this Agreement due to such objections. Upon any such termination, Buyer shall be refunded the Deposit unless Buyer was the direct and actual cause of such disapproved title objection in violation of the provisions and conditions hereunder, in which case Seller shall be entitled to retain the Deposit. If Seller fails to respond to Buyer&#8217;s objections within two (2) Business Days after receiving the Supplemental Objection Notice, Seller shall be deemed to have elected not to cure such objections and Buyer shall have the right and option to either: (a)&#160;terminate this Agreement and be refunded the Deposit, unless Buyer was the direct and actual cause of such disapproved title objection in violation of the provisions and conditions hereunder, in which case Seller shall be entitled to retain the Deposit; or (b)&#160;waive its right to terminate this Agreement, in which case this Agreement shall continue in full force and effect.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	5.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Permitted Property Exceptions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The term &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Permitted Property Exceptions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;, as used herein, shall mean:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	5.4.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	all matters set forth in the Title Report and the Supplement(s) (if any) and approved by Buyer as herein provided;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	5.4.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	any title exception created directly by any act or omission of Buyer and(or) the Buyer Subcontractors;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	5.4.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	a lien to secure the payment of general and special property taxes and assessments, not delinquent;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	5.4.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	a lien to secure the payment of supplemental and escape taxes assessed as a result only of the transfer of the Real Property to Buyer;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	5.4.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	matters of record created by, caused by or otherwise in accordance with the written consent of Buyer;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	5.4.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	any assessment districts now in existence or otherwise in formation (to the extent all assessments thereunder are current and non-delinquent); and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	5.4.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	all Applicable Laws.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Documents and Disclosures
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	6.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Property Materials
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Buyer hereby acknowledges that Seller has delivered to Buyer the documentation described on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit &#8220;6.1&#8221;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;attached hereto prior to the Effective Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	6.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Excluded Materials
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The Property Materials shall not include the following documents (collectively, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Excluded Materials
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

	6.3

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	6.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Disclaimers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Buyer shall be under an obligation to seek out and obtain during the Feasibility Period such additional information and documentation as Buyer may deem necessary in order to evaluate the Property. It shall be Buyer&#8217;s responsibility to evaluate, test and otherwise reach its own conclusions as to the condition of the Property (environmental, structural code and compliance with Applicable Laws), without warranty or representation from Seller except as expressly set forth in this Agreement. The obligations of Seller in connection with the Transaction shall be solely governed by this Agreement and the Closing Documents irrespective of the contents of the Property Materials. Except as expressly set forth in this Agreement, Buyer shall rely upon its own independent investigation concerning matters contained in the Property Materials.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	6.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Disclosure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Buyer shall treat the Property Materials as confidential, and shall not disclose any information gained by the review of the Property Materials to any third parties, except as necessary to Buyer&#8217;s Agents, attorneys and lenders. Except as reasonably necessary with respect to its due diligence of the Property and as provided in the foregoing sentence, Buyer shall not make copies of the Property Materials available to any third parties. After the Closing Date, Buyer&#8217;s obligations under this Agreement to maintain confidentiality and to avoid disclosure shall cease as to the Property Materials.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	6.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Buyer Obligations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Buyer acknowledges and agrees that any reports, studies, plans and other documentation provided by Seller do not necessarily represent all of the documentation that may be in existence with respect to the environmental, structural condition and compliance with Applicable Laws of the Property, but, rather, represent documentation in Seller&#8217;s possession or control that relate to the topic of the environmental, structural condition and compliance with Applicable Laws of the Property. Accordingly, Buyer acknowledges its obligation to seek out and obtain such additional information and documentation as Buyer may deem necessary in order to evaluate the environmental, structural condition and compliance with Applicable Laws of the Property.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	6.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Return of Documents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If this Agreement is terminated for any reason or Buyer is otherwise in default hereunder, then Buyer shall promptly return to Seller the Property Materials or destroy/delete all copies thereof.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Feasibility Period
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage144"></A>
<A NAME="BPI201510-KXEXX1058_HTM_S03189AB92710D514120057E060C1A344">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Feasibility Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The Feasibility Period shall not be extended for any reason whatsoever without the written consent of Seller and Buyer, which consent may be withheld in each such Parties&#8217; sole and absolute discretion.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Buyer Actions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Buyer shall, throughout the Feasibility Period, diligently investigate and confirm all matters that Buyer deems relevant to its proposed acquisition and operation of the Property, including, without limitation:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the status of title, as set forth in Sections 5.2 and 5.3 hereof;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the physical and environmental condition of the Property, including applicable geologic, environmental and structural conditions (including any pest infestation) and mold, and such other matters that may arise by reason of the Buyer Investigation;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	whether and to what extent the Property has been constructed in accordance with the applicable plans and specifications;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the existence and terms of any governmental assessments, including future obligations;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2.12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the existence of any life safety or ADA issues;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2.13
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the economic feasibility of operating the Property and Buyer&#8217;s analyses with respect to the same;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2.14
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Applicable Laws, including the application and compliance of the Property with applicable building and zoning codes;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_51"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2.15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the operating statements for the Property;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2.16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the results of any reports and studies commissioned by Buyer; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.2.17
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the content of the Property Materials.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	License
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Seller hereby grants to Buyer and Buyer&#8217;s Agents a license to enter upon the Property for purpose of undertaking and completing inspections and testing activities (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	License
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), upon and subject to the provisions and conditions of this Agreement. Buyer shall have the right to commence Buyer&#8217;s physical inspection(s) and(or) testing of the Property and to undertake any engineering, environmental, soils and(or) other studies of the Property immediately after the Effective Date until the termination of this Agreement as provided herein, provided that Buyer gives Seller not less than twenty-four (24) hours prior written notice of its intended inspection(s), inquiries and(or) testing. Buyer&#8217;s physical inspection of and(or) testing on the Property shall not include any invasive testing or boring without the prior written consent of Seller, which consent may be withheld, conditioned, or delay in Seller&#8217;s sole and absolute discretion. Buyer&#8217;s physical inspection of and(or) testing on the Property shall be conducted during normal business hours, at times mutually acceptable to Buyer and Seller, and shall not unreasonably interfere with Seller&#8217;s business activities or the business activities of Seller&#8217;s tenants, invitees and licensees. Buyer may not make inquiries of or contact with Seller&#8217;s management staff or employees without Seller&#8217;s prior written consent, which consent may be withheld, conditioned, or delayed in Seller&#8217;s sole and absolute discretion. Seller or its representatives shall have the right (but not the obligation) to be present during any inspection(s) and(or) testing of the Property. Promptly following completion of any inspection or testing, Buyer shall, at its sole cost and expense, restore the
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage145"></A>
<A NAME="BPI201510-KXEXX1058_HTM_S03189AB92710D514120057E060C1A344">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Property to substantially its condition as it existed immediately prior to Buyer&#8217;s entry to the Property, provided that Buyer shall not be obligated to remediate any pre-existing environmental conditions or other defects at, on or under the Property as part of its restoration obligation nor any other liability for the mere discovery of such conditions. Buyer shall use care and consideration in connection with any of its inspections or tests. Buyer and Buyer&#8217;s Agents shall comply with all Applicable Laws which might in any way relate to Buyer&#8217;s inspections and testing activities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Buyer Indemnity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Buyer shall indemnify, defend (with counsel acceptable to Seller) and hold the Property, Seller and the Seller Parties free and forever harmless from and against any and all Claims resulting from Buyer&#8217;s and Buyer&#8217;s Agents inspection and testing of the Real Property, including, without limitation, repairing any and all damages to any portion of the Real Property arising out of or related (directly and indirectly) to Buyer and Buyer&#8217;s Agents conducting such inspections and tests; provided, however, that the foregoing indemnification, defense and hold harmless agreement by Buyer shall not apply to Buyer&#8217;s discovery of any adverse condition or fact relating to the Property.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Intentionally Deleted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	7.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Feasibility Approval
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Buyer may elect, at its sole discretion, during the Feasibility Period and upon written notice to Seller, to either: (a)&#160;proceed with the purchase of the Property based on its review of the Property during the Feasibility Period (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Approval Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;); or (b)&#160;disapprove its review of the Property during the Feasibility Period (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Disapproval Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), in which case this Agreement shall be deemed terminated and Buyer shall be refunded the Deposit. In the absence of either, Buyer shall be deemed to have approved its review. If Buyer so provides an Approval Notice or fails to provide a notice, then the Deposit shall be liquidated damages pursuant to Section 18.2 if Buyer defaults pursuant to the provisions and conditions of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Representations and Warranties of Seller
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	8.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Seller Representations and Warranties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Seller hereby represents and warrants as of the Effective Date the following to Buyer:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	8.1.18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Seller has the legal right, power and authority to enter into this Agreement and to consummate the Transaction and the execution, delivery and performance of this Agreement and the Closing Documents have been duly authorized and no other action by Seller or any other person or entity is required for the valid and binding execution, delivery and performance of this Agreement and the Closing Documents; and Seller has obtained all necessary approvals and consents to the execution and delivery of this Agreement and the consummation of the Transaction contemplated hereby;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	8.1.19
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Seller is not a foreign person as defined in Section 1445 of the Internal Revenue Code;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	8.1.20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Neither Seller nor any of its principals or Affiliates: (a)&#160;is listed on the Specially Designated Nationals and Blocked Persons List maintained by the Office of Foreign Assets Control of the Department of the Treasury or on any other similar list; (b)&#160;is a person or entity with which Buyer is prohibited from dealing or otherwise engaging in any transaction by any anti-terrorism law; (c)&#160;is a person or entity that commits, threatens or conspires to commit or supports &#8220;terrorism&#8221; as defined in Executive Order No. 13224, 66 Fed. Reg. 49079 (published September 25, 2001) or any similar Executive Orders; or (d)&#160;is affiliated or associated with a person or entity listed in preceding clause &#8220;(a)&#8221;, &#8220;(b)&#8221; or &#8220;(c)&#8221;.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage146"></A>
<A NAME="BPI201510-KXEXX1058_HTM_S03189AB92710D514120057E060C1A344">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	8.1.21
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	There are no contracts, agreements, arrangement or contractual obligations of any kind, including service or maintenance contracts, operating, management or employment contracts or other similar agreements that will or may affect Buyer or the Property after the Closing except those contracts and agreements copies of which have been provided to Buyer as part of the Property Materials.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	8.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	No Other Representations and Warranties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Other than the representations and warranties set forth in Section 8.1 above and otherwise as expressly provided in this Agreement and in the Closing Documents, Seller specifically is making no other representations or warranties hereunder or otherwise pursuant to the Closing Documents.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	8.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Limitations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The Parties agree, upon and subject to the provisions and conditions of Section 8.4 hereof, that: (a)&#160;Seller&#8217;s representations and warranties contained in Section 8.1 and the Closing Documents shall survive the Closing for a period of twelve (12) months after the Closing Date (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Limitation Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;); and (b)&#160;Buyer shall provide actual written notice to Seller before the end of the Limitation Period of any breach of such representations and warranties and shall allow Seller ten (10) Days within which to cure such breach. If Seller fails or is unable to cure such breach after actual written notice and within such cure period, Buyer&#8217;s sole remedy shall be upon and subject to the provisions and conditions of Section 18.1.3 hereof, which must be commenced, if at all, within two (2) months after the expiration of Seller&#8217;s cure period. The Limitation Period referred to herein shall apply to known as well as unknown breaches of such representations or warranties.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	8.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Changed Circumstances
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The representations and warranties set forth in Section 8.1 hereof are made by Seller only as of the Effective Date. The Parties acknowledge the possibility that prior to the Closing, acts, actions and occurrences, whether within or outside the control of any Party hereof, may arise which result in the occurrence and(or) discovery of facts and circumstances inconsistent with and(or) otherwise different from the representations and warranties set forth in Section 8.1 hereof. To the extent that Buyer has knowledge of a breach by Seller of any of the covenants, representations and warranties set forth in Section 8.1 hereof or elsewhere in this Agreement, or any of the Closing Documents, prior to the Closing Date, and Buyer nonetheless elects to acquire the Property as herein provided, then Buyer shall be deemed to have waived, released, acquitted and discharged all Claims that Buyer may have by reason of such known default by Seller of such covenants, representations or warranties and any right to a refund of the Deposit and(or) recover any damages. In addition to any other manner of obtaining knowledge, Buyer shall be deemed, for purposes hereof, to be aware of a breach by Seller, as so provided, if written notice of the applicable matter is provided to Buyer by Seller as provided herein.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Representations and Warranties of Buyer
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Buyer Representations and Warranties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Buyer hereby represents and warrants as of the Effective Date the following to Seller:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	9.1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Buyer has the legal right, power and authority to enter into this Agreement and to consummate the Transaction, and the execution, delivery and performance of this Agreement and the Closing Documents have been duly authorized and no other action by Buyer is required for the valid and binding execution, delivery and performance of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	9.1.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	No bankruptcy, insolvency, rearrangement, or similar action or proceeding, whether voluntary or involuntary, is pending or threatened against Buyer and Buyer has no intention of filing or commencing any such action or proceeding.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	9.1.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Neither Buyer nor any of its principals or Affiliates: (a)&#160;is listed on the Specially Designated Nationals and Blocked Persons List maintained by the Office of Foreign Assets Control of the Department of the Treasury or on any other similar list; (b)&#160;is a person or entity with which Seller is prohibited from dealing or otherwise engaging in any transaction by any anti-terrorism law; (c)&#160;is a person or entity that commits, threatens or conspires to commit or supports &#8220;terrorism&#8221; as defined in Executive Order No. 13224, 66 Fed. Reg. 49079 (published September 25, 2001) or any similar Executive Orders; or (d)&#160;is affiliated or associated with a person or entity listed in preceding clause &#8220;(a)&#8221;, &#8220;(b)&#8221; or &#8220;(c)&#8221;.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	As Is Purchase; Indemnity; Waiver of Claims
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	10.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	AS-IS PURCHASE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. BUYER HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGES, REPRESENTS, WARRANTS, COVENANTS AND AGREES THAT AS A MATERIAL INDUCEMENT TO SELLER TO EXECUTE AND ACCEPT THIS AGREEMENT, AND IN CONSIDERATION OF THE PERFORMANCE BY SELLER OF ITS DUTIES AND OBLIGATIONS UNDER THIS AGREEMENT, EXCEPT AS PROVIDED IN THE EXPRESS REPRESENTATIONS, WARRANTIES AND COVENANTS OF SELLER EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN ARTICLE 8 OF THIS AGREEMENT AND EXCEPT AS MAY BE EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THE CLOSING DOCUMENTS (COLLECTIVELY, &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXPRESS REPRESENTATIONS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), THE SALE OF THE PROPERTY HEREUNDER IS AND SHALL BE MADE ON AN &#8220;AS IS, WHERE IS&#8221; BASIS AND NO PERSON ACTING ON BEHALF OF SELLER IS AUTHORIZED TO MAKE, AND SELLER HAS NOT MADE, DOES NOT MAKE AND SPECIFICALLY NEGATES AND DISCLAIMS, ANY REPRESENTATIONS, WARRANTIES OR GUARANTIES OF ANY KIND OR CHARACTER WHATSOEVER, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, ORAL OR WRITTEN, PAST, PRESENT, FUTURE OR OTHERWISE, OF, AS TO, CONCERNING OR WITH RESPECT TO THE PROPERTY (EXCEPT THE EXPRESS REPRESENTATIONS), INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION: (1)&#160;THE EXISTENCE OF HAZARDOUS MATERIALS OR MOLD UPON THE REAL PROPERTY OR ANY PORTION THEREOF; (2)&#160;GEOLOGICAL CONDITIONS, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, SUBSIDENCE, SUBSURFACE CONDITIONS, WATER TABLE, UNDERGROUND WATER RESERVOIRS, AND LIMITATIONS REGARDING THE WITHDRAWAL OF WATER AND FAULTING; (3)&#160;WHETHER OR NOT AND TO THE EXTENT TO WHICH THE REAL PROPERTY OR ANY PORTION THEREOF IS AFFECTED BY ANY STREAM (SURFACE OR UNDERGROUND), BODY OF WATER, FLOOD PRONE AREA, FLOOD PLAIN, FLOODWAY OR SPECIAL FLOOD HAZARD; (4)&#160;DRAINAGE; (5)&#160;SOIL CONDITIONS, INCLUDING THE EXISTENCE OF INSTABILITY, PAST SOIL REPAIRS, SOIL ADDITIONS OR CONDITIONS OF SOIL FILL, OR SUSCEPTIBILITY TO LANDSLIDES, OR THE SUFFICIENCY OF ANY UNDERSHORING; (6)&#160;USAGES OF ADJOINING PROPERTIES; (7)&#160;THE VALUE, COMPLIANCE WITH THE PLANS AND SPECIFICATIONS, SIZE, LOCATION, AGE, USE, DESIGN, QUALITY, DESCRIPTION, DURABILITY, STRUCTURAL INTEGRITY, OPERATION, TITLE TO, OR PHYSICAL OR FINANCIAL CONDITION OF THE PROPERTY OR ANY PORTION THEREOF, OR ANY RIGHTS OR CLAIMS ON OR AFFECTING OR PERTAINING TO THE PROPERTY OR ANY PART THEREOF, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, WHETHER OR NOT THE IMPROVEMENTS COMPLY WITH THE REQUIREMENTS OF TITLE III OF THE AMERICANS WITH DISABILITIES ACT OF 1990, 42 U.S.C. &#167;&#167; 12181-12183, 12186(B) &#8211; 12189 AND RELATED REGULATIONS; (8)&#160;THE SQUARE FOOTAGE OF THE LAND OR THE IMPROVEMENTS; (9)&#160;IMPROVEMENTS AND INFRASTRUCTURE, IF ANY; (10)&#160;DEVELOPMENT RIGHTS, ENTITLEMENTS, APPROVALS AND EXACTIONS AND THE FORCE AND EFFECT AND COMPLIANCE WITH THE SAME; (11)&#160;WATER OR WATER RIGHTS; (12)&#160;THE EXISTENCE AND
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	POSSIBLE LOCATION OF ANY UNDERGROUND UTILITIES; (13)&#160;THE EXISTENCE AND POSSIBLE LOCATION OF ANY ENCROACHMENTS; (14)&#160;WHETHER THE IMPROVEMENTS WERE BUILT, IN WHOLE OR IN PART, IN COMPLIANCE WITH APPLICABLE BUILDING CODES AND OTHER APPLICABLE LAWS AND ORDINANCES; (15)&#160;THE STATUS OF ANY LIFE-SAFETY SYSTEMS IN THE IMPROVEMENTS; (16)&#160;THE CONDITION OR USE OF THE PROPERTY OR COMPLIANCE OF THE PROPERTY WITH ANY OR ALL APPLICABLE LAWS; (17)&#160;THE MERCHANTABILITY OF THE PROPERTY OR FITNESS OF THE PROPERTY FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE (BUYER AFFIRMING THAT BUYER HAS NOT RELIED ON SELLER&#8217;S SKILL OR JUDGMENT TO SELECT OR FURNISH THE PROPERTY FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND THAT SELLER MAKES NO WARRANTY THAT THE PROPERTY IS FIT FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE); (18)&#160;WHETHER OR NOT THE PROPERTY HAS BEEN BUILT IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE GOVERNMENTALLY-APPROVED PLANS AND SPECIFICATIONS FOR THE SAME; (19)&#160;THE IMPACT THAT AN EARTHQUAKE, OF ANY MAGNITUDE, MAY HAVE ON THE PROPERTY AND WHETHER AND TO WHAT EXTENT THE PROPERTY WAS DESIGNED OR CONSTRUCTED TO WITHSTAND AN EARTHQUAKE OF ANY PARTICULAR MAGNITUDE; (20)&#160;THE EXISTENCE OR POTENTIAL FUTURE EXISTENCE OF ANY ASSESSMENT DISTRICTS OR ADDITIONAL GOVERNMENTAL OR ADMINISTRATIVE FEES, COSTS, LEVIES OR ASSESSMENTS; AND(OR) (21)&#160;THE STATUS OF ANY OF THE TENANCIES UPON THE PROPERTY.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	10.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	BUYER EXAMINATIONS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. BUYER ACKNOWLEDGES THAT BUYER SHALL HAVE COMPLETED ALL PHYSICAL, DOCUMENTARY AND FINANCIAL EXAMINATIONS RELATING TO THE ACQUISITION OF THE PROPERTY HEREUNDER TO THE EXTENT BUYER DEEMS NECESSARY; IT BEING ACKNOWLEDGED AND AGREED THAT BUYER HAS BEEN PROVIDED THE OPPORTUNITY TO AND SHALL BE DEEMED TO HAVE FULLY INSPECTED EACH RESIDENTIAL UNIT, ALL COMMON AREAS (INCLUDING ALL FACILITIES AND AMENITIES) WITHIN THE PROPERTY, AND, EXCEPT BUYER&#8217;S RELIANCE ON THE EXPRESS REPRESENTATIONS, BUYER SHALL ACQUIRE THE SAME SOLELY ON THE BASIS OF SUCH EXAMINATIONS AND THE TITLE INSURANCE PROTECTION FOR THE PROPERTY AFFORDED BY BUYER&#8217;S TITLE POLICY, AND NOT ON ANY INFORMATION PROVIDED OR TO BE PROVIDED BY SELLER. BUYER FURTHER ACKNOWLEDGES AND AGREES THAT ANY INFORMATION PROVIDED OR TO BE PROVIDED WITH RESPECT TO THE PROPERTY WAS OBTAINED FROM A VARIETY OF SOURCES, AND THAT SELLER HAS NOT MADE (AND IS UNDER NO DUTY TO MAKE) ANY INDEPENDENT INVESTIGATION OR VERIFICATION OF SUCH INFORMATION AND MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES AS TO THE ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF SUCH INFORMATION (EXCEPT THE EXPRESS REPRESENTATIONS).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	10.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	SELLER NOT BOUND
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. EXCEPT AS SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT AND THE CLOSING DOCUMENTS, SELLER SHALL NOT BE BOUND IN ANY MANNER BY ANY VERBAL OR WRITTEN STATEMENTS, REPRESENTATIONS, APPRAISALS, ENVIRONMENTAL ASSESSMENT REPORTS, OR OTHER INFORMATION PERTAINING TO THE PROPERTY OR THE OPERATION THEREOF, FURNISHED BY SELLER OR ANYONE ELSE, OR BY ANY REAL ESTATE BROKER, AGENT, REPRESENTATIVE, EMPLOYEE, SERVANT OR OTHER PERSON ACTING ON SELLER&#8217;S BEHALF. BUYER EXPRESSLY ACKNOWLEDGES AND AGREES THAT SELLER SHALL BE UNDER NO OBLIGATION TO REPAIR, REMEDIATE OR RECONSTRUCT THE PROPERTY EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV>

	10.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	BUYER&#8217;S RELIANCE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. WITHOUT LIMITING THE GENERALITY OF THE FOREGOING, BUYER SHALL PERFORM AND, EXCEPT FOR THE EXPRESS REPRESENTATIONS, RELY SOLELY UPON ITS OWN INVESTIGATION CONCERNING ITS INTENDED USE OF THE PROPERTY, AND THE PROPERTY&#8217;S FITNESS THEREFOR. BUYER FURTHER ACKNOWLEDGES AND AGREES THAT SELLER&#8217;S COOPERATION WITH BUYER, WHETHER BY PROVIDING THE PROPERTY MATERIALS OR PERMITTING INSPECTION OF THE PROPERTY, SHALL NOT BE CONSTRUED AS ANY WARRANTY OR REPRESENTATION, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, OF ANY KIND WITH RESPECT TO THE PROPERTY, OR WITH RESPECT TO THE ACCURACY, COMPLETENESS OR RELEVANCE OF THE PROPERTY MATERIALS (EXCEPT THE EXPRESS REPRESENTATIONS).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	10.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Release
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	10.5.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Buyer, for itself and on behalf of each of its respective successors and assigns (collectively, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Releasors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), by this general release of known and unknown claims (this &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Release
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), hereby irrevocably and unconditionally releases and forever discharges Seller and each of the Seller Parties (collectively, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Releasees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;) or any of them, from and against any and all Claims of any kind or nature whatsoever,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WHETHER KNOWN OR UNKNOWN
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, suspected or unsuspected, fixed or contingent, liquidated or unliquidated, which any of the Releasors now have, own, hold, or claim to have had, owned, or held, against any of the Releasees arising from, based upon or related to the condition of the Property.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	10.5.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Buyer hereby further acknowledges and agrees as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	There is a risk that subsequent to the execution of the Release set forth herein, Releasors may discover, incur, or suffer from Claims which were unknown or unanticipated at the time this Release is executed, including, without limitation, unknown or unanticipated Claims which, if known by Buyer on the date this Release is being executed, may have materially affected Buyer&#8217;s decision to execute this Release. Buyer acknowledges that Releasors are assuming the risk of such unknown and unanticipated Claims and agree that, except as expressly provided in this Agreement and(or) any of the Other Agreements, this Release applies thereto.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	SELLER&#8217;S INITIALS
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	BUYER&#8217;S INITIALS
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	10.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Third Party Beneficiaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. It is specifically acknowledged and agreed that each of the Seller Parties and each of the Buyer Parties shall be third party beneficiaries of this ARTICLE 10.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Seller Deliveries at Closing
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	11.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Closing Documents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. At least one Business Day prior to the Closing, Seller shall deliver to Escrow Holder the following (collectively, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Closing Documents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;):
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

	&#8221;) relating to the Intangible Personal Property;

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

	11.2

	.

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Buyer may waive compliance on Seller&#8217;s part under any of the items referred to in this ARTICLE 11 by an instrument in writing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	12.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	. At least one Business Day prior to the Closing Date, Buyer shall deliver to Escrow Holder the following:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

	12.1.2
</FONT>

	a closing statement in form and content satisfactory to Buyer (&#8220;
</FONT>

	Buyer Closing Statement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;) duly executed by Buyer;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>

	two (2) duly executed counterpart originals of the Assignment of Assets;

<A NAME="BPI201510-KXEXX1058_HTM_S03189AB92710D514120057E060C1A344">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	12.1.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the balance of the Purchase Price, plus any additional amounts payable by Buyer hereunder, as adjusted by the credits and prorations set forth herein.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	12.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
